articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
You can find my CV here.
B.A. in Economics Anadolu University, Eskişehir, TURKEY
M.A. in Economics Ankara University, Ankara, TURKEY
Masters in Economics North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC, USA
Ph.D. in Agricultural Economics Kansas State University, Manhattan, KS, USA
I am a Research Assistant at Ankara University Economics Department. I teach undergraduate statistics and data science courses.
My research interests include Agricultural Economics, Environmental Economics, and Applied Econometrics. I am a member of DigitalLab Mulkiye. I like coding in R and writing useless R packages.
I live in Ankara with my wife and our 4 cats (Badem, Alfred, Frida, and Duman).
